oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt issued to J.M. Henry for a subscription to “Confederate Veteran,” 1907 December 30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A receipt issued to Mr. J.M. Henry who “paid $1.00 on subscription to Confederate Veteran, from Dec. 1907 to Dec. 1908, M.A. Ward, Agent.” S.A. Cunningham was the editor and proprietor of the “Confederate Veteran,” published at Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Arcade Music Collection. 1 document.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Henry, John M.
